title: NFL Week 13 Fantasy/DFS Breakdown (Football 11/29)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Heath Cummings to look at the week from a fantasy perspective, including the Saints-Cowboys matchup on Thursday (2:00), whether Drew Brees is worth sitting this week (6:30), the Panthers-Buccaneers shootout coming (9:15), whether Golden Tate is worth owning (11:00), if Marcus Mariota is a top 12 QB in fantasy (13:30), if Lamar Jackson needs to be added now (15:30), what bad QBs you could fade for DST purposes this week (17:45), how to handle Leonard Fournette (19:30), if Joe Mixon is bench able (21:00), whether Tom Brady should be starting (22:30), Matt Ryan's situation this week (24:30), being worried about James Conner (28:45), beer talk! (30:45) and DFS chatter (34:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
